summary: BUY TOKEN - NFINITY AI is a platform offering various AI models for text-to-image, audio generation, text-to-speech, image restoration, text-to-video, and utilities. The platform aims to make open source models accessible to all users for easy deployment. Infinite Access to Infinite Models is coming soon, allowing users to explore, customize, deploy, and get paid for their AI innovations. The platform also provides details about the tokenomics, including the allocation of tokens for liquidity pool, marketing, KOLs, research & development, team & advisors, and a contract address.
